00033 
00038     template<class SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT /* see VCLForwards.h */>
00039     class compressed_matrix
00040     {
00041     public:
00042       typedef scalar<typename viennacl::tools::CHECK_SCALAR_TEMPLATE_ARGUMENT<SCALARTYPE>::ResultType>   value_type;
00043       
00045       compressed_matrix() : _rows(0), _cols(0), _nonzeros(0) { viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::init(); }
00046       
00053       explicit compressed_matrix(unsigned int rows, unsigned int cols, unsigned int nonzeros = 0) : 
00054         _rows(rows), _cols(cols), _nonzeros(nonzeros)
00055       {
00056         viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::init();
00057         
00058         if (rows > 0)
00059           _row_buffer = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(unsigned int) * rows);
00060         if (nonzeros > 0)
00061         {
00062           _col_buffer = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(unsigned int) * nonzeros);
00063           _elements = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE) * nonzeros);
00064         }
00065       }
00066       
00075       void set(unsigned int * row_jumper, unsigned int * col_buffer, SCALARTYPE * elements, unsigned int cols, unsigned int nonzeros)
00076       {
00077         assert(cols > 0);
00078         assert(nonzeros > 0);
00079         _row_buffer = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(unsigned int) * (cols + 1), row_jumper);
00080         _col_buffer = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(unsigned int) * nonzeros, col_buffer);
00081         _elements = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE) * nonzeros, elements);
00082         _nonzeros = nonzeros;
00083         _rows = cols;
00084         _cols = cols;
00085       }
00086         
00088       void reserve(unsigned int new_nonzeros)
00089       {
00090         if (new_nonzeros > _nonzeros)
00091         {
00092           viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> _col_buffer_old = _col_buffer;
00093           viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> _elements_old = _elements;
00094           _col_buffer = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(unsigned int) * new_nonzeros);
00095           _elements = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE) * new_nonzeros);
00096           
00097           cl_int err;
00098           err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _col_buffer_old, _col_buffer, 0, 0, sizeof(unsigned int)*_nonzeros, 0, NULL, NULL);
00099           CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00100           err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _elements_old, _elements, 0, 0, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*_nonzeros, 0, NULL, NULL);
00101           CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00102 
00103           _nonzeros = new_nonzeros;
00104         }
00105       }
00106 
00113       void resize(unsigned int new_size1, unsigned int new_size2, bool preserve = true)
00114       {
00115         if (new_size1 > 0 && new_size2 > 0)
00116         {
00117           if (new_size1 > _rows) //enlarge buffer
00118           {
00119             if (_rows == 0)
00120             {
00121               _row_buffer = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(unsigned int)*(new_size1 + 1));
00122               _col_buffer = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(unsigned int)*(new_size1 + 1));
00123               _elements = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*(new_size1 + 1));
00124               //set new memory to zero:
00125               std::vector<unsigned int> coord_temp(new_size1 + 1);
00126               std::vector<SCALARTYPE> temp(new_size1 + 1);
00127               cl_int err;
00128               err = clEnqueueWriteBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _row_buffer, CL_TRUE, 0, sizeof(unsigned int)*coord_temp.size(), &(coord_temp[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
00129               CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00130               err = clEnqueueWriteBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _col_buffer, CL_TRUE, 0, sizeof(unsigned int)*coord_temp.size(), &(coord_temp[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
00131               CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00132               err = clEnqueueWriteBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _elements, CL_TRUE, 0, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*temp.size(), &(temp[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
00133               CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00134             }
00135             else //enlarge only row array, because no entries are added to the matrix
00136             {
00137               viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> _row_buffer_old = _row_buffer;
00138               _row_buffer = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(unsigned int)*(new_size1 + 1));
00139               cl_int err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _row_buffer_old, _row_buffer, 0, 0, sizeof(unsigned int)* (_rows + 1), 0, NULL, NULL);
00140               CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00141               
00142               //set new memory to zero:
00143               std::vector<SCALARTYPE> temp(new_size1 - _rows + 1);
00144               err = clEnqueueWriteBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _elements, CL_TRUE, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*(_rows + 1), sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*temp.size(), &(temp[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
00145               CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00146             }
00147           }
00148           else if (new_size1 < _rows) //reduce buffer
00149           {
00150               viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> _row_buffer_old = _row_buffer;
00151               _row_buffer = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(unsigned int)*(new_size1 + 1));
00152               cl_int err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _row_buffer_old, _row_buffer, 0, 0, sizeof(unsigned int) * (new_size1 + 1), 0, NULL, NULL);
00153               CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00154             
00155             //TODO: discard entries in the matrix that are beyond the allowed sizes
00156           }
00157           
00158           _rows = new_size1;
00159           _cols = new_size2;
00160         }
00161       }
00162 
00164       const unsigned int & size1() const { return _rows; }
00166       const unsigned int & size2() const { return _cols; }
00168       const unsigned int & nnz() const { return _nonzeros; }
00169       
00171       const viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> & handle1() const { return _row_buffer; }
00173       const viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> & handle2() const { return _col_buffer; }
00175       const viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> & handle() const { return _elements; }
00176       
00177     private:
00178       unsigned int _rows;
00179       unsigned int _cols;
00180       unsigned int _nonzeros;
00181       viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> _row_buffer;
00182       viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> _col_buffer;
00183       viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> _elements;
00184     };
00185

00190     //provide copy-operation:
00205     template <typename CPU_MATRIX, typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00206     void copy(const CPU_MATRIX & cpu_matrix,
00207                      compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_matrix )
00208     {
00209       if ( cpu_matrix.size1() > 0 && cpu_matrix.size2() > 0 )
00210       {
00211         gpu_matrix.resize(static_cast<unsigned int>(cpu_matrix.size1()), static_cast<unsigned int>(cpu_matrix.size2()), false);
00212         
00213         //determine nonzeros:
00214         long num_entries = 0;
00215         for (typename CPU_MATRIX::const_iterator1 row_it = cpu_matrix.begin1();
00216               row_it != cpu_matrix.end1();
00217               ++row_it)
00218         {
00219           unsigned int entries_per_row = 0;
00220           for (typename CPU_MATRIX::const_iterator2 col_it = row_it.begin();
00221                 col_it != row_it.end();
00222                 ++col_it)
00223           {
00224             ++entries_per_row;
00225           }
00226           num_entries += viennacl::tools::roundUpToNextMultiple<unsigned int>(entries_per_row, ALIGNMENT);
00227         }
00228         
00229         //std::cout << "CPU->GPU, Number of entries: " << num_entries << std::endl;
00230         
00231         //set up matrix entries:
00232         std::vector<unsigned int> row_buffer(cpu_matrix.size1() + 1);
00233         std::vector<unsigned int> col_buffer(num_entries);
00234         std::vector<SCALARTYPE> elements(num_entries);
00235         
00236         unsigned int row_index = 0;
00237         unsigned int data_index = 0;
00238         
00239         for (typename CPU_MATRIX::const_iterator1 row_it = cpu_matrix.begin1();
00240               row_it != cpu_matrix.end1();
00241               ++row_it)
00242         {
00243           row_buffer[row_index] = data_index;
00244           ++row_index;
00245           
00246           for (typename CPU_MATRIX::const_iterator2 col_it = row_it.begin();
00247                 col_it != row_it.end();
00248                 ++col_it)
00249           {
00250             col_buffer[data_index] = static_cast<unsigned int>(col_it.index2());
00251             elements[data_index] = *col_it;
00252             ++data_index;
00253           }
00254           data_index = viennacl::tools::roundUpToNextMultiple<unsigned int>(data_index, ALIGNMENT); //take care of alignment
00255         }
00256         row_buffer[row_index] = data_index;
00257         
00258         /*gpu_matrix._row_buffer = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, row_buffer);
00259         gpu_matrix._col_buffer = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, col_buffer);
00260         gpu_matrix._elements = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, elements);
00261         
00262         gpu_matrix._nonzeros = num_entries;*/
00263         gpu_matrix.set(&row_buffer[0], &col_buffer[0], &elements[0], static_cast<unsigned int>(cpu_matrix.size1()), num_entries);
00264       }
00265     }
00266     
00267     
00268     //adapted for std::vector< std::map < > > argument:
00274     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00275     void copy(const std::vector< std::map<unsigned int, SCALARTYPE> > & cpu_matrix,
00276                      compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_matrix )
00277     {
00278       copy(tools::const_sparse_matrix_adapter<SCALARTYPE>(cpu_matrix), gpu_matrix);
00279     }
00280     
00281     //gpu to cpu:
00291     template <typename CPU_MATRIX, typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00292     void copy(const compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_matrix,
00293                      CPU_MATRIX & cpu_matrix )
00294     {
00295       if ( gpu_matrix.size1() > 0 && gpu_matrix.size2() > 0 )
00296       {
00297         cpu_matrix.resize(gpu_matrix.size1(), gpu_matrix.size2());
00298         
00299         //get raw data from memory:
00300         std::vector<unsigned int> row_buffer(gpu_matrix.size1() + 1);
00301         std::vector<unsigned int> col_buffer(gpu_matrix.nnz());
00302         std::vector<SCALARTYPE> elements(gpu_matrix.nnz());
00303         
00304         //std::cout << "GPU->CPU, nonzeros: " << gpu_matrix.nnz() << std::endl;
00305         
00306         cl_int err;
00307         err = clEnqueueReadBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), gpu_matrix.handle1(), CL_TRUE, 0, sizeof(unsigned int)*(gpu_matrix.size1() + 1), &(row_buffer[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
00308         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00309         err = clEnqueueReadBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), gpu_matrix.handle2(), CL_TRUE, 0, sizeof(unsigned int)*gpu_matrix.nnz(), &(col_buffer[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
00310         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00311         err = clEnqueueReadBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), gpu_matrix.handle(), CL_TRUE, 0, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*gpu_matrix.nnz(), &(elements[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
00312         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00313         viennacl::ocl::finish();
00314         
00315         //fill the cpu_matrix:
00316         unsigned int data_index = 0;
00317         for (unsigned int row = 1; row <= gpu_matrix.size1(); ++row)
00318         {
00319           while (data_index < row_buffer[row])
00320           {
00321             if (col_buffer[data_index] >= gpu_matrix.size1())
00322             {
00323               std::cerr << "ViennaCL encountered invalid data at colbuffer[" << data_index << "]: " << col_buffer[data_index] << std::endl;
00324               return;
00325             }
00326             
00327             if (elements[data_index] != static_cast<SCALARTYPE>(0.0))
00328               cpu_matrix(row-1, col_buffer[data_index]) = elements[data_index];
00329             ++data_index;
00330           }
00331         }
00332       }
00333     }
00334     
00340     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00341     void copy(const compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_matrix,
00342               std::vector< std::map<unsigned int, SCALARTYPE> > & cpu_matrix)
00343     {
00344       tools::sparse_matrix_adapter<SCALARTYPE> temp(cpu_matrix);
00345       copy(gpu_matrix, temp);
00346     }
